Original title: Kiss the Girls
Year: 1997
115 min.
Country: United States
Director: Gary Fleder
Screenplay: David Klass (Novel: James Patterson)
Music: Mark Isham
Photo: Aaron E. Schneider
Starring: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Cary Elwes, Tony Goldwyn, Jay O. Sanders, Brian Cox, Mena Suvari, Tatyana M. Ali, Bill Nunn, Jeremy Piven, Alex McArthur, Richard T. Jones, Roma Maffia, Gina Ravera
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Genre: Thriller. Mystery | Serial Murderers. Abductions / Disappearances

Synopsis
Dr. Axel Cross (Morgan Freeman) is detective, forensic psychologist and author of successful crime novels. When his niece Naomi disappears, begins his own investigation. Seven girls have gone and found two bodies. Next to the last of them has appeared a signed note 'Casanova'. Cross receives help from Kate McTiernan (Ashley Judd), a young doctor who has escaped the abductor and may be the only person able to identify a 'Casanova'. Despite the initial reluctance of the detective, together they embark on a race against time to find niece Cross and discover the shocking truth behind his disappearance.
